Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a light-brown pottery vessel, the fabric is partially greyish in section, the interior is slightly ribbed and spotted with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and remains of three lines of red-painted Coptic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394510) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394510)
